template_id.title: Template identifier
template_id.description: Identifier of the template that this task is based on

permute_order.title: Enable scripts order permutation
permute_order.description: If task template specified a permutation orders path, this property can be used to specify whether the permutation should be applied or not

time_travel_phase_id.title: Time travel phase identifier
time_travel_phase_id.description: If the task template supports time travel, this property can be used to specify the version of the data that will be queried by this task

task_executor_arguments.title: Task executor arguments
task_executor_arguments.description: Any arguments passed to a (custom) task executor need to be defined here.

custom_task_executor.title: Identifier for a custom task executor
custom_task_executor.description: If the task template should be executed with a custom task executor, this property can be used to specify which executor to use

replace_regex.title: List of regex to match and replace
replace_regex.description: List of regex to match and corresponding replacement in the SQL scripts associated with this task

target_endpoint.title: Target endpoint index (default: 0)
target_endpoint.description: The positional index (starting from 0) of the connection manager within the connections configuration file
